format: A tibble with 344 rows and 17 variables:
reference: AdÃ©lie penguins: Palmer Station Antarctica LTER and K. Gorman. 2020. Structural size measurements and isotopic signatures of foraging among adult male and female AdÃ©lie penguins (Pygoscelis adeliae) nesting along the Palmer Archipelago near Palmer Station, 2007-2009 ver 5. Environmental Data Initiative. doi: 10.6073/pasta/98b16d7d563f265cb52372c8ca99e60f
title: Penguin size, clutch, and blood isotope data for foraging adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica
description:
Description
Includes nesting observations, penguin size data, and isotope measurements from blood samples for adult AdÃ©lie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo penguins.

parameters.Region: a character string denoting the region of Palmer LTER sampling grid
parameters.Flipper Length: an integer denoting the length penguin flipper (millimeters)
parameters.Body Mass: an integer denoting the penguin body mass (grams)
parameters.Comments: a character string with text providing additional relevant information for data
parameters.Delta 15 N: a number denoting the measure of the ratio of stable isotopes 15N:14N
parameters.Clutch Completion: a character string denoting if the study nest observed with a full clutch, i.e., 2 eggs
parameters.Culmen Depth: a number denoting the depth of the dorsal ridge of a bird's bill (millimeters)
parameters.Sample Number: an integer denoting the continuous numbering sequence for each sample
parameters.Stage: a character string denoting reproductive stage at sampling
parameters.Sex: a character string denoting the sex of an animal
parameters.Delta 13 C: a number denoting the measure of the ratio of stable isotopes 13C:12C
parameters.Island: a character string denoting the island near Palmer Station where samples were collected
parameters.Culmen Length: a number denoting the length of the dorsal ridge of a bird's bill (millimeters)
parameters.Species: a character string denoting the penguin species
parameters.Individual ID: a character string denoting the unique ID for each individual in dataset
parameters.Date Egg: a date denoting the date study nest observed with 1 egg (sampled)
parameters.studyName: Sampling expedition from which data were collected, generated, etc.
